name: Clicking Keys
description:
You are an angry gamer who punched the keyboard so hard that the keys went flying everywhere. Now you must navigate the world to recover your keys in order to progress. 

Player mechanics are limited at the start of the game because they are missing "keyboard keys" tied to these mechanics. Find the key in the world to unlock the ability to press the key and perform its functionality.

Keys:

"A" : Move Left 

"D" : Move Right 

"W" : Jump

"Q" : Pickup/Place Box 

"E" : Interact With Button 

"F" : Push/Pull Box

"Space" : Glide
